title: Colonial Chronicles: Kochi
overview: Walk through the timeline of history in the ancient port city of Muziris and the colonial streets of Fort Kochi. Experience the fusion of Portuguese, Dutch, British, and Jewish cultures that shaped the Malabar coast.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kochi
itinerary.desc: Check-in to a heritage colonial bungalow. Evening sunset cruise past the Chinese Fishing Nets.

itinerary.title: Jew Town & Mattancherry
itinerary.desc: Visit the Paradesi Synagogue, Dutch Palace, and the spice markets of Mattancherry.

itinerary.title: Muziris Heritage Project
itinerary.desc: A guided boat tour to the excavation sites of the ancient port of Muziris and Paliyam Palace.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Traditional Kerala breakfast and transfer to Cochin International Airport.

title: The Rice Boat Legacy
overview: Live on a traditional 'Kettuvallam' (Rice Barge) and explore the Kuttanad regionâ€”the only place in the world where farming is done below sea level. A journey into the heart of Kerala's agrarian heritage.

itinerary.title: Boarding the Kettuvallam
itinerary.desc: Welcome drink and cruise through the intricate canal networks of Alleppey.

itinerary.title: Village Life & Toddy Tapping
itinerary.desc: Canoe ride into narrow canals to witness coir making, toddy tapping, and duck farming.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Morning cruise through the Vembanad Lake and disembarkation.

title: Myths of Malabar
overview: Journey to North Kerala, the land of 'Looms and Lores'. Witness the divine Theyyam ritual, explore massive coastal forts, and visit the last remaining handloom weaving villages.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kannur
itinerary.desc: Visit St. Angelo Fort and the Arakkal Museum, dedicated to the only Muslim royal family of Kerala.

itinerary.title: Weaving Traditions
itinerary.desc: Visit a traditional handloom village to see the weaving of Kannur cotton.

itinerary.title: Theyyam Experience
itinerary.desc: Night visit to a local shrine to witness the intense and colorful Theyyam ritual performance.

itinerary.title: Bekal Fort
itinerary.desc: Day trip to the massive keyhole-shaped Bekal Fort overlooking the Arabian Sea.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Transfer to Kannur International Airport.

title: High Range Tea Tales
overview: Stay in colonial-era planter's bungalows and discover the history of tea in the High Ranges. From the British era to the present day, explore the misty hills of Munnar.

itinerary.title: Drive to the Hills
itinerary.desc: Scenic drive through Cheeyappara waterfalls and check-in to a heritage bungalow.

itinerary.title: Tea Museum & Tasting
itinerary.desc: Visit the Tata Tea Museum to understand the machinery and history, followed by a tea tasting session.

itinerary.title: Top Station & Marayoor
itinerary.desc: Visit the prehistoric Dolmens of Marayoor and the sandalwood forests.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Drive back to Kochi/Coimbatore for departure.

title: Royal Travancore
overview: Walk the corridors of the Padmanabhapuram Palace, the largest wooden palace in Asia, and explore the rich history of the Travancore Royal Family in the capital city.

itinerary.title: The Capital City
itinerary.desc: Visit the Napier Museum and the Sri Chitra Art Gallery to see Raja Ravi Varma paintings.

itinerary.title: Wooden Palace
itinerary.desc: Day trip to Padmanabhapuram Palace to marvel at 16th-century Kerala architecture.

itinerary.title: Temple Heritage
itinerary.desc: Heritage walk around the Padmanabhaswamy Temple and Kuthiramalika Palace.

title: Wayanad: Ancient Trails
overview: Explore the Neolithic history of the Edakkal Caves, trek through ancient spice plantations, and experience the indigenous tribal heritage of the Western Ghats.

itinerary.title: Edakkal Caves
itinerary.desc: Hike to the Edakkal Caves  to see pictorial writings from 6000 BC.

itinerary.title: Spice & Tribes
itinerary.desc: Visit a working spice plantation and the Wayanad Heritage Museum.

itinerary.title: Thirunelli Temple
itinerary.desc: Visit the ancient 'Kashi of the South' nestled deep in the Brahmagiri hills.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Transfer to Calicut International Airport.
